mapper.insert: insert into book (book_id, book_name, book_author, book_publih, book_isbn, book_brief, book_price, book_store, book_lend, book_lose, book_picture, book_style, book_lendtimes) values (#{bookId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPublih,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookIsbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookBrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bookStore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookLend,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookLose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bookPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookStyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookLendtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER})
